topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Screen Capture

name: Continuous Screenshot
short_description: Continuous Screenshot takes screenshot continuously in a matter defined by the user: start time, duration, delay between shots, etc. The user can define a screen area to be monitored, so that the next shot is only taken when the monitored area changes.
